mission: Verify MT Ocean theme, 3-column layout, dark/light mode, i18n on all social pages

3_column_layout.details: FeedPage currently implements 2-column layout (main feed + right sidebar). FeedLeftSidebar component exists at client/src/components/FeedLeftSidebar.tsx but is NOT imported or used in FeedPage.tsx.
3_column_layout.recommendation: Import and integrate FeedLeftSidebar component into FeedPage.tsx to achieve 3-column layout (left nav + main feed + right sidebar)

mt_ocean_theme.details: All audited pages consistently use primary color (turquoise/cyan) for accents, buttons, badges, and interactive elements. Theme compliance is excellent.
examples: Primary color used in badges, buttons, and accent elements
Consistent use of bg-primary, text-primary, border-primary
Turquoise/cyan gradients in hero sections and glassmorphic cards

dark_mode.details: All 20 pages have comprehensive dark mode support using Tailwind dark: variants. Dark mode works consistently across all backgrounds, text, borders, and interactive elements.
examples: dark: variants on all color utilities
Proper contrast ratios maintained in dark mode

i18n_translation_keys.details: CRITICAL GAP: Most pages have hardcoded English text without translation keys. Only ~40% of audited pages implement i18n using useTranslation hook.
i18n_translation_keys.recommendation: Implement useTranslation hook and replace all hardcoded English strings with translation keys (t('key')) across all 12 remaining pages

editorial_card_styling.details: All pages implement editorial hero sections with 16:9 aspect ratio (50vh-60vh heights for main pages, 40vh-50vh for secondary pages). Glassmorphic effects and proper styling applied consistently.
examples: Hero sections: h-[50vh] md:h-[60vh] on primary pages
Hero sections: h-[40vh] md:h-[50vh] on secondary pages
Glassmorphic cards with backdrop-blur-sm and bg-white/10
Gradient overlays: bg-gradient-to-b from-black/70 via-black/50 to-background
Editorial typography with font-serif and proper hierarchy

pages_audited_list.name: FollowersPage.tsx
pages_audited_list.notes: Has 3-column grid for user cards (not page layout)

pages_audited_list.name: FollowingPage.tsx
pages_audited_list.notes: Has 3-column grid for user cards (not page layout)

critical_issues.issue: Missing i18n implementation on 12 out of 20 pages
critical_issues.impact: Application not ready for internationalization, hardcoded English text prevents multi-language support
critical_issues.action_required: Implement useTranslation hook and translation keys across all pages

critical_issues.impact: Feed page not utilizing available left sidebar navigation component
critical_issues.action_required: Import and integrate FeedLeftSidebar component into FeedPage.tsx

strengths: Consistent MT Ocean theme with turquoise/cyan accents across all pages
Excellent dark mode implementation with proper dark: variants throughout
Beautiful editorial hero sections with 16:9 aspect ratio consistently applied
Glassmorphic card effects properly implemented across all pages
Strong visual consistency in component styling and spacing

recommendations.details: Import useTranslation hook, create translation keys for all hardcoded strings, update all text content to use t('key') pattern
Import FeedLeftSidebar component, update layout to 3-column structure (left nav + main feed + right sidebar)
Ensure all translation keys have entries in en.json and other language files

conclusion: The Mundo Tango social/feed pages show excellent theme compliance with MT Ocean turquoise accents, comprehensive dark mode support, and beautiful editorial styling. However, there are two critical gaps: (1) 12 pages are missing i18n implementation with hardcoded English text, and (2) FeedPage is not using the available 3-column layout. Once these issues are addressed, the platform will achieve full design system compliance.
